unnormalised: Campus hiring season is crucial, especially for fresh talent from institutions like IIT Delhi. Focusing on skills relevant to today's market, like AI, is vital. We had a successful drive at BITS Pilani on 22/07/2024. Offering competitive packages is key to attract candidates, aiming for Rs. 8 LPA onwards. Interviews start 01/08/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Remember past successes like our program in Kolkata on 15/01/2023. Building strong relationships is key for long-term talent acquisition. We must offer valuable opportunities!
normalised: Campus hiring season is crucial, especially for fresh talent from institutions like I I T Delhi. Focusing on skills relevant to today's market, like A I, is vital. We had a successful drive at B I T S Pilani on twenty second july two thousand and twenty four. Offering competitive packages is key to attract candidates, aiming for rupee eight L P A onwards. Interviews start first august two thousand and twenty four at ten zero zero hours. Remember past successes like our program in Kolkata on fifteenth january two thousand and twenty three. Building strong relationships is key for long-term talent acquisition. We must offer valuable opportunities!
